meanings.definition: A sweet or pleasant taste or flavor.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a douceur that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The ice cream had a delightful douceur of vanilla.
meanings.sent3: The douceur of the chocolate was so tempting that I couldn't resist.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking always had a special douceur that warmed the heart.
meanings.sent5: The douceur of the fresh strawberries was like a burst of happiness in my mouth.

meanings.definition: A gift or bribe given as a token of appreciation or goodwill.
meanings.sent1: He offered a small douceur to thank them for their help.
meanings.sent2: The douceur was a gesture of gratitude for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The douceur of chocolates was a sweet way to show appreciation.
meanings.sent4: The douceur of the gift was a symbol of their friendship.
meanings.sent5: She received a lovely douceur as a token of their friendship.
